code: import{FETCH_COURSE_GOAL_PENDING,FETCH_COURSE_GOAL_SUCCESS,FETCH_COURSE_GOAL_FAIL}from'../constants/ActionTypes';import{getCourseGoal}from'../../services';var fetchGoalPending=function fetchGoalPending(mamh){return{type:FETCH_COURSE_GOAL_PENDING,payload:mamh};};var fetchGoalSuccess=function fetchGoalSuccess(data){return{type:FETCH_COURSE_GOAL_SUCCESS,payload:data};};var fetchGoalFail=function fetchGoalFail(mamh,error){return{type:FETCH_COURSE_GOAL_FAIL,payload:{mamh:mamh,error:error}};};export var fetchGoal=function fetchGoal(mamh){return function(dispatch){console.log(fetchGoalPending(mamh));dispatch(fetchGoalPending(mamh));getCourseGoal(mamh).then(function(data){return{mamh:mamh,data:data};}).then(function(data){dispatch(fetchGoalSuccess(data));}).catch(function(err){dispatch(fetchGoalFail(mamh,err.message));});};};
